titleStmt.title: Description of Ms. Codex 1223 - Fragments of the Digests of Justinian, Book 37, Titles 7-9 (1400-1499)

publicationStmt.publisher: Schoenberg Center for Electronic Text and Image, University of Pennsylvania

availability.licence: This work and all referenced images are Â©2014 University of Pennsylvania. They are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License (CC BY-NC 4.0), http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/.

msContents.summary: Bifolium with fragments from Book 37 of the Digests of Justinian I (Byzantine emperor, 527-565), containing (in order) sections of Title 7 on dowries, Title 9 on inheritance, and Title 8 on the children of marriages in which one partner is an emancipated slave. The text is surrounded by 15th-century commentary on the laws.

msItem.title: Fragments of the Digests of Justinian, Book 37, Titles 7-9
De ventre in possessionem mittendo et curatore eius (37.9.1), f. 1v
De coniungendis cum emancipato liberis eius (37.8.1.10), f. 2r
